title: hellamental (by sleepyinsomniac)
author: sleepyinsomniac
excerpt: [ATTACH] Hello all, Just wanted to drop by again to let you know I have released a new game called hellamental, a free-to-play adventure where...
siteName: TouchArcade - iPhone, iPad, Android Games Forum
text: ​Hello all, Just wanted to drop by again to let you know I have released a new game called hellamental, a free-to-play adventure where you’ll dive into dream worlds to confront lingering nightmares. Survive relentless waves of enemies, explore and hopefully EXTRACT from dungeons, and catch loot falling from endless invasions. Collect and craft from over 350 unique “Visions,” turning them into your own arsenal called Casters, each with customizable stats and perks. Trade your crafted items and Casters globally at the Bazaar, fine-tune powerful Loadouts, and master three dynamic game modes. No ads, no Wi-Fi required—just endless dreaming, crafting, and conquering nightmares at your own pace.App info is currently processing and/or the app is not yet fully available for sale on the US App Store. App Store: https://apps.apple.com/eg/app/hellamental/id6470613644 I also have a website that lays out everything (MOSTLY!) https://hellamental.com To TouchArcade and the TouchArcade community: Thank you for all of the excellent coverage and community over the years of iOS gaming specifically. Until we meet again Share This Page
html:
1. ​
    Hello all,

    Just wanted to drop by again to let you know I have released a new game called hellamental, a free-to-play adventure where you’ll dive into dream worlds to confront lingering nightmares. Survive relentless waves of enemies, explore and hopefully EXTRACT from dungeons, and catch loot falling from endless invasions. Collect and craft from over 350 unique “Visions,” turning them into your own arsenal called Casters, each with customizable stats and perks. Trade your crafted items and Casters globally at the Bazaar, fine-tune powerful Loadouts, and master three dynamic game modes. No ads, no Wi-Fi required—just endless dreaming, crafting, and conquering nightmares at your own pace.

    App info is currently processing and/or the app is not yet fully available for sale on the US App Store.

    App Store:
    https://apps.apple.com/eg/app/hellamental/id6470613644

    I also have a website that lays out everything (MOSTLY!)
    https://hellamental.com

    To TouchArcade and the TouchArcade community: Thank you for all of the excellent coverage and community over the years of iOS gaming specifically. Until we meet again

Share This Page
